name: Corruptor's Scourgestones
tooltip:
Corruptor's Scourgestones

A Corruptor's Scourgestone is the insignia of the Scourge's overlords.  A powerful being that holds a position of authority over the Scourge will always possess one.  To slay such a malevolent creature would surely advance the cause of the Argent Dawn, and all good causes!

On behalf of the Argent Dawn, I will give you a valor token in exchange for just a single one of these insignia.  Use caution in acquiring one, <name> - such powerful beings are not to be trifled with.

Requirements:
- Corruptor's Scourgestone
